mwErrorMessages.hasToBeValidEmail: has to be a valid e-mail
mwErrorMessages.hasToBeValidUrl: has to be a valid URL
mwErrorMessages.hasToBeValidPhoneNumber: has to be a valid phone number
mwErrorMessages.hasToBeMinLength: has to have a least {{ngMinlength}} chars
mwErrorMessages.hasToBeSmallerLength: must not have more chars than {{ngMaxlength}}
